article_title: GoVols247: Five-star QB 'really comfortable' with Vols
article_text:
Hunter Johnson, the nation’s No. 10 overall prospect and No. 1 pro-style quarterback prospect in the 2017 industry-generated 247Sports Composite. (GoVols247 photo)

By Wes Rucker, Govols247 The nation’s top 2017 quarterback prospect made another unofficial visit to Tennessee on Saturday for Orange Carpet Day, and he told GoVols247 that he and his family loved every bit of it. Hunter Johnson, the nation’s No. 10 overall prospect and No. 1 pro-style quarterback prospect in the 2017 industry-generated 247Sports Composite, also said after Saturday’s visit that he might be winding down his recruitment sooner rather than later. Continue reading at GoVols247. Read more articles from GoVols247.
